workflow_1753629667006.name: *ðŸš€ ELENA STRATEGIC COORDINATION - PERFECT SSELFIE STUDIO LAUNCH WORKFLOW
workflow_1753629667006.description: I'll coordinate the **"SSELFIE STUDIO Perfect Launch Protocol"** deploying your entire 13-agent ecosystem to create the most sophisticated, luxury-positioned AI transformation platform launch in business history, optimized for your 135K viral social media explosion.

steps.taskDescription: - I'm assigning you to create the ultimate luxury brand consistency audit and enhancement system at client/src/components/`client/src/components/launch/LuxuryLaunchBranding.tsx`. Use our established design references (Landing page, About, Blog, Workspace, Admin dashboard) to ensure perfect visual consistency with Times New Roman headlines, full bleed hero sections, elegant spacing, and sophisticated color palette throughout. Create comprehensive brand guidelines enforcement and luxury positioning validation for â‚¬67 premium experience. Priority: Critical. Duration: 35 minutes.

- You'll optimize the complete user experience architecture by creating advanced UX perfection suite at client/src/components/`client/src/components/launch/UXLaunchOptimization.tsx`. Reference our Workspace and Admin dashboard patterns for navigation consistency, implement agent card styling throughout platform, ensure mobile-responsive luxury design, and perfect the 4-step user journey (TRAINâ†’STYLEâ†’PHOTOSHOOTâ†’BUILD) with seamless flow optimization. Include conversion optimization for â‚¬67 subscription positioning. Priority: Critical. Duration: 35 minutes.

- I need you to create enterprise-grade launch infrastructure at client/src/components/`server/services/launch-architecture-perfection.ts` with advanced performance optimization for 135K+ viral traffic surge, database scaling for massive subscriber influx, API response optimization, and complete technical readiness for viral social media amplification. Include monitoring systems and auto-scaling preparation. Priority: Critical. Duration: 40 minutes.

- You'll perfect the AI image generation experience by creating advanced creative optimization at client/src/components/`server/services/maya-launch-optimization.ts` with FLUX model performance enhancement, Maya Chat interface refinement for Step 2 (STYLE), BUILD workspace collaboration optimization with Victoria, and premium creative direction capabilities that justify â‚¬67 positioning. Priority: Critical. Duration: 35 minutes.

- I'm assigning you to create sophisticated brand voice perfection at client/src/components/`client/src/components/launch/PremiumVoiceLaunch.tsx` with luxury copywriting standards matching our Blog and About page tone, compelling â‚¬67 value proposition messaging, transformation storytelling for 135K social amplification, and premium brand voice consistency across all touchpoints. Priority: Critical. Duration: 30 minutes.

- I'm assigning you to create flawless quality assurance for launch at client/src/components/`server/testing/launch-quality-perfection.ts` with comprehensive testing protocols, user journey validation, payment processing verification (â‚¬67 subscriptions), mobile experience testing, and enterprise-grade quality standards ensuring perfect launch execution. Priority: Critical. Duration: 30 minutes.
